article_node.title: I tested Synology's BeeStation Plus - and this subscription-free NAS could replace your cloud storage
article_node.summary: The Synology BeeStation Plus is a plug‑and‑play NAS that offers 8 TB of built‑in storage at no subscription cost, with easy setup, silent operation, and integration with Plex, cloud sync, and automated backups. The review highlights its suitability for freelancers, small businesses, and power users who need reliable, local storage without the complexity of a full DiskStation, and notes that it can be powered by a UPS for uninterrupted access. Priced around $400, the device has received positive user reviews for its simplicity, performance, and ability to sync with multiple cloud services. Overall, the BeeStation Plus provides a cost‑effective, feature‑rich solution for anyone looking to replace cloud subscriptions with a local, scalable storage hub.
